All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Assistant
Class for the Assistant cards
AssistantsController
controller of the assistants scene
Character
Class for the Character cards
CharactersController
controller for the Characters GUI scene
CLI
CLI class for Command Line Interface game UI
Client
Client class used for server connection and communication
ClientController
Controller used by the Client
ClientExec
Class to execute client and handle its setup/connection
ClientHandler
Handler for client communication
ClientRequest
Interface for client requests to the server
ClientRequestHandler
A method for every possible Request the Client may make to the Server these methods are implemented in the client.requests package, one class each
ClientView
Interface for Client UI
Cloud
Class of the Cloud Tile, an instance of the abstract class StudentAccessiblePiece
CloudController
controller for the zoomed clouds scene in the GUI
Color
Students and professors available colors
Eriantys
Main class of the game, used to start it (client or server)
Game
Class containing all the game info needed to play.
GameController
Class for the Main Game Controller
GamePhase
Enum of all available game phases
GameServer
Server main runner class, initializes socket
GameStartedRequest
Request to ask if the game has started
GetUpdatedBoardRequest
Request to ask for and updated model
GetUpdatedBoardResponse
Response with updated model inside
GUI
main class responsible for starting and handling the game GUI
GUIController
controller for the whole GUI interface
Island
Class for the island of the game
IslandController
controller for the zoomed islands GUI scene
LobbyController
controller for the lobby GUI scene
MoveMotherNatureRequest
Request to move mother nature
MoveStudentRequest
Request to move students
NicknameController
controller for the nickname selection GUI scene
OperationResultResponse
Response with operation result
PassTurnRequest
Request to pass turn
PlayAssistantRequest
Request to play assistants
PlayCharacterRequest
Request to play characters
Player
Class for Players instances in the game
PlayersController
controller for the number of players selection GUI scene
ProfilesController
controller for the game status GUI scene
RealmController
controller for the whole realm GUI scene
SchoolBoard
Class for School Boards, inherits HashSetstudents from StudentAccessiblePiece, which is used to save students in the entrance
SchoolboardController
Controller responsible for managing the player's SchoolBoard
Server
Server main class to start the setup
ServerController
Controller used by the Server
ServerResponse
Interface for Server Responses
ServerResponseHandler
Class for the server responses handler
SetNicknameRequest
Request to set nickname
SetNicknameResponse
Response with info on how to proceed client setup
SetPlayerNumberRequest
Request to set player number
StartController
controller for the main menu GUI scene
StudentAccessiblePiece
Abstract class that includes all pieces which can contain students (Islands, Clouds, etc.)
Team
Class for Teams participating in the game
TowerColor
Towers available colors
WaitingRequest
Request to wait game
